pkgmetadata.longdescription: # WordXWord自动化渲染库 ```pythonfrom wordx.sheet import Sheet sheet = Sheet('template.docx')sheet.render(data)sheet.save('output.docx')```制作Word模板需配套使用word模板工具![Word模板工具箱](http://storage.heinz97.top/github/wordx-tool.png)Word文件模板示例![Word模板示例](http://storage.heinz97.top/github/word-template.png)
